info.title: Tokener API
info.description: This microservice aims to generate tokens for the clients, so they can use the token to access any microservice on the company network. It is a simple service that generates a token and stores it in a centralized database. This microservice aims to solve the problem of generating tokens in disparate environments, where each microservice has its own token generator.

get.description: Its just a simple endpoint to show the API presentation
